aboutPage.title: About Us - {{common.appName}}
aboutPage.description: Learn more about {{common.appName}}, our mission, and the passion behind our handcrafted wooden products.

aboutPage.heading: About {{common.appName}}
aboutPage.text: {{common.appName}} is dedicated to creating unique and high-quality wooden products. Each item is carefully handcrafted, reflecting our commitment to traditional artistry and sustainable practices. We believe in the beauty of natural wood and strive to bring warmth and elegance into your home.
